definitions.text: the thing arranged or agreed to
examples: they made arrangements to meet in Chicago

definitions.text: an orderly grouping (of things or persons) considered as a unit; the result of arranging
an organized structure for arranging or classifying
examples: he changed the arrangement of the topics
the facts were familiar but it was in the organization of them that he was original
he tried to understand their system of classification

definitions.text: the spatial property of the way in which something is placed
a piece of music that has been adapted for performance by a particular set of voices or instruments
the act of arranging and adapting a piece of music
